name: hardhat-test

scripts.deploy:ignition:sepolia: yes | hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TestnetDeployment.js --network worldchain-sepolia --parameters ignition/parameters/testnet.json
scripts.deploy:ignition:mainnet: yes | hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/FullDeployment.js --network worldchain-sepolia --parameters ignition/parameters/worldchain-mainnet.json
scripts.deploy:election:sepolia: yes | hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/ElectionDeployment.js --network worldchain-sepolia --parameters ignition/parameters/worldchain-sepolia.json
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run extract-abi
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run deploy:election:sepolia && cd ../my-app && npm run sync-contracts

description: Hardhat project for testing TUTE contract
